sentence: DISSECTED ARTIFACT  FINAL PRODUCT  Short* reflection Creating my “Frankenthing” made me reflect on my trajectory as a “fixer.” When I was a child, I liked to tinker with components of radios, pocket calculators, an old TV that we had at home.
One of them is associated with the perceived status of those who fix and repair things.
As Jackson notes, innovation and repair came to be seen as two extremes of the social order.
Maybe, his words made me reflect, the fixer can really see value where others see waste.
